review_text: Amazing food. PERIOD.  Service is always perfect, food is always on point, and the staff is very friendly and accommodating.
I stayed here for three nights in November 2021. What an amazing hotel.
Clean, modern, and had a fantastic view over [City]. The rooms were big for Sylhet standards. I can't complain about this hotel. The gym was great, the rooftop bar was fantastic.
Wonderful place to stay. I don’t normally stay in hostels but this was perfect - the beds are comfortable.
I had a great time meeting everyone and socializing yet when I wanted to, I could get a quiet night’s sleep.
The rooms are quiet despite the fact that if you want to, you can spend time outside with other travelers and the staff - who, by the way, were exceptional.
All of the facilities were clean and modern. The restaurant located inside the hotel, [Restaurant Name], was delicious. I dined here for breakfast and dinner.
I was greeted with such kindness and this continued throughout my stay. I booked the king room and my room was situated on the 14th floor. The room was fantastic.
Always looking forward to this place with my friends, the fried vanilla ice cream is exceptionally good!
